items.title: Gold price hits record high as investors seek safety
items.description: Experts say uncertainty resulting from US policy is making investors seek safer investments such as gold.

items.title: Russia's Putin hails 'unprecedented' ties with China at talks in Beijing
items.description: The two leaders are seeking to promote "a more just and reasonable global governance system".

items.title: Hundreds killed in Sudan landslide, UN  says
items.description: Sunday's landslide followed heavy rain and "levelled" a remote village, a local armed group says.

items.title: Aerial search for survivors after Afghan quake kills 800 people
items.description: Rescuers are hampered by mountainous terrain and roads strewn with debris.

items.title: Beijing tightens control ahead of Xi's big moment on world stage
items.description: It is a big week for Xi Jinping, who will host Vladimir Putin and Kim Jong Un in Beijing at a massive military parade.
